Inflation gauge: The heavy duty pressure gauge measures psi to make sure you are inflating to the perfect pressure
Needles included: Includes 3 needles for pumping up all sizes of soccer balls, footballs, basketballs, playground balls and other inflatables. This pump is not recommended as a bicycle tire pump
Emergency ball maintenance: Keep this ball maintenance kit in your bag so the game never goes flat; Ensure that the proper air pressure meets your game day requirements. Comes with a convenient carry case to bring with you wherever you go
Easy to use: Pump up deflated sports balls quickly and easily, so you or your players can get back into the game. Don’t let a deflated ball ruin your play. Perfect for gyms, schools, sports centers, camps, and more

Product Description

A Basic house repair tool kit is essential whether you are doing basic DIY work or working household projects. M MEEPO 186-piece tool set is suitable for most home repair, auto repair and DIY projects. All the tools are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping. 186-piece high quality tool kit includes hammer, flat & phillips screwdriver set, adjustable water pump pliers, tape measure, socket set and socket adapter, screwdriver bit set and holder, Metric allen wrench set, lineman pliers, magnetic level and etc. All tools are made of high quality chrome vanadium steel forged at high temperature, high strength, high hardness, durability, corrosion resistance. This tool set can be used in indoor and outdoor. Suitable for most house maintenance, DIY projects and etc

Product Description

Sundpey Tool Set 257 PCS. Bring You A More Comfortable Home

No more hectic trips to the hardware store. Whether you are hanging up picture frames, tightening screws or doing repairs in the house, this Sundpey Tool Kit for Home offers all the important tools you need in one sturdy carrying case.Perfectly suited for all work in the house, garden and garage.One purchase and long-term use are our pursuit of quality.

Tool Set 257Pcs General Hand Tool Kit – Sundpey

Sundpey 257Pcs Tool Set is the perfect choice to accomplish your general purpose projects, repairs, and maintenance at home, garage, office, shop or dormitory.No matter you are a homeowner, a business owner, a college student or a DIYer.It contains all the basic but necessary tools you will need around your home to assemble furniture, install back yard and patio essentials, hang picture frame, fix simple plumbing issues, repair your bicycle, and a lot more.Sundpey always insists on providing customers with high-quality tools and good service.If you have any questions, please feel free to message us, we will provide you with a solution that makes you smile as soon as possible.

Including Various Drill Bits/Screw Heads/Extension Rods/Sleeves/Chuck Keys/Handles/Suitcases

Special Features
Precision Screwdrivers Set included Precision Screwdriver Set included Magnetizer/Demagnetizer & Flexible Shaft & Rasp Set Tools & Home Improvement Tool Set Precision Screwdriver Set included Electric Power Drills

【Muti-purpose Tools Kit】257pcs basic Tool Kit for household repair and car repair, nearly includs most tools. Perfect suitable for DIY-er, repairmen, construction workers, mechanics and etc.
【Complete Varieties】Useful Tool Set include Combination Wrenches,Adjustable Wrench，Torpedo Level, a complete range of 1/4 inch and 3/8 inch Metric Sockets, Precision Screwdrivers, Hammer, Tape Measure, Pliers, Ratchet Wrench. Variety of 1/4-inch Screwdriver Bits: Phillips, Slotted, Square, Star and Pozi. Soft-grip handle on screwdrivers, pliers, srtipper and hammer provides excellent comfort and control.
【Wide Application】This Tool Kit for home can be used in indoor and outdoor. 257pcs Tool Kit is perfect for home DIY projects and most small repairs, such as furniture assembling, garage constuction, woodwork, plumbing repair, car repairs, outdoor fittings, garden decoration,etc. Case size: 11.82″*3.94″*17.72″. Weight: 10.4lb.
【Sturdy Compact Storage Case】Tools are neatly stored in a sturdy case to keep them secure, clean, organized and easy to find,for easy tool storage and portability. Excellent Gift choice for your family, college students and friends.
【High Quality】These Basic Tool Kits are forged from high-quality steel and finished in high-polish chrome,strength, durability. All the tool kits meet or exceed industry standards. Sundpey provide 12-month warranty, and devoted to provide high quality Tool Set and service to all customers. Kindly Tip: When opening the toolbox, please place the side with ”Sundpey” logo on the top to prevent the tools falling out from the box.

From the brand

High Quality Car Cleaning Kit

You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.

Car Detailing Cleaning Kit

【COMPLETE CAR INTERIOR CLEANING KIT】The car Interior detailing supplies kit includes car vacuum*1,cleaning gel*1, windshield cleaning tool*1,replaceable microfiber pads*2, 100ml spray bottle*1, car detailing brushes*5, car dash duster brush*1, air vents brush*2, microfiber towels*2, durable tool storage bag*1.You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.
【STRONG SUCTION AND BRIGHT LED LIGHT】Car vacuum cleaner adopt 120W power motor, can provide almost 7500Pa ultra-strong suction, which allows to easily pick up dirt, crumbs, and pet hair from the car with outstanding cleaning performance.This handheld vacuum features a bright LED Light which is helpful for the dark cleaning and corner cleaning.Vacuum cleaner cord is 16.4 feet long and comes with 4 accessories (auxiliary connector, long nozzle, brush nozzle, extension hose).
【CAR INTERIOR CARE KIT】 Car cleaning gel, dashboard dust brush, microfiber towels and air outlet brushes can be used with car vacuum cleaner to remove dust from the surface of the car. Car windshield cleaning tool is designed with an extended handle and a rotatable triangular head, which is convenient for cleaning the bottom of the window or some difficult-to-clean areas. 5 different sizes of premium detail brushes make it easy to explore tight spaces, lug nuts and any other hard-to-reach areas.
【PREMIUM MATERIAL & HUMANIZED DESIGN】These car cleaning supplies are made from fine material to be soft,sturdy and durable.Absolutely safe to clean on delicate surfaces. The car cleaning kit is ergonomically designed and will not cause fatigue to your hands or arms after long hours of work.All car cleaning kit tools are packed in an Oxford bag, which is very convenient and space-saving. You can place it anywhere in the trunk or back seat.
【PERFECT GIFT FOR CAR LOVERS】: Say goodbye to the constant hassle of removing dust, dirt or stubborn stains with the Lezcufer car cleaning Interior detailing kit, designed for car interior use! It can be a great gift for any car buffs or new car owners.Make car cleaning to become a simple thing. 

Car Detailing Kit

Say goodbye to the constant hassle of removing dust, dirt or stubborn stains with the Lezcufer car cleaning Interior detailing kit, designed for carinterior and exterior use. The professional choice for car lovers! It can be a great gift for any car buffs or new car owners.

COMPLETE CAR INTERIOR CLEANING KIT

You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. All car cleaning kit tools are packed in an Oxford bag, which is very convenient and space-saving. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.

includes： car vacuum*1,cleaning gel*1, windshield cleaning tool*1,replaceable microfiber pads*2, 100ml spray bottle*1, car detailing brushes*5, car dash duster brush*1, air vents brush*2, microfiber towels*2, durable tool storage bag*1.

Read more

High Quality Motor

Our car vacuum cleaner adopts 120W/12V high-power motor with a strong suction power of up to 7500PA, the noise is controlled below 70DB, it can be used both wet and dry, which easily remove dust, sand, paper debris, hair, food scraps or spilled liquids.

Significant-Efficiency Cleaning

Using high-quality, durable ABS, the suction is stable and the noise is low. Washable, reusable HEPA filter, greener and more durable. Strong suction, while improving cleaning efficiency, it can meet the needs of deep cleaning, maximize the effect, save time and effort.

Unique LED Light Design

Built-in bright LED lights provide great visibility when you’re cleaning corners, car seat bottoms, and other hard-to-see places. Helps you clean quickly in the dark, bringing a lot of convenience to cleaning work.
